required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Rifampin Effect Study of SHR2554 on Healthy Chinese Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open, Single Does, Drug-drug Interaction Study to Investigate the Effects of Rifampin on the Pharmacokinetics of Healthy Chinese Adult Subjects After Oral Administration of SHR2554 Tablets

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of Rifampin on pharmacokinetics of healthy Chinese adult subjects after oral administration of SHR2554 tablets. The secondary objective of the study is to evaluate the safety of single-dose oral administration of SHR2554 in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC) of SHR2554

secondary_outcome.measure: Other pharmacokinetics parameter: Tmax of SHR2554
secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax) of SHR2554

secondary_outcome.measure: Other pharmacokinetics parameter: T1/2 of SHR2554
The incidence and severity of adverse events/serious adverse events

arm_group.description: Single-dose oral administration of SHR2554 and multiple-dose oral administration of Rifampin Capsules

intervention.description: Single-dose oral administration of SHR2554 and multiple-dose oral administration of Rifampin Capsules
